thread.title: Lib Dem peer: Tax credit cuts will have a terrible effect
thread.title_full: Lib Dem peer: Tax credit cuts will have a terrible effect - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Lib Dem peer: Tax credit cuts will have a terrible effect
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Lib Dem peer: Tax credit cuts will have a terrible effect 25 October 2015 Last updated at 17:10 GMT
The Liberal Democrats' chief whip in the House of Lords says cuts to tax credits would have a "terrible effect" on low-income families.
Speculation is growing over whether the Lords will block the measure when it comes before them on Monday.
Lord Newby says the government needs to rethink the proposals.
Read more Labour 'would support any U-turn' over tax credits
